catalogPage.title: Product Catalog
catalogPage.description: We offer only high-quality hand-knitted goods with fast delivery throughout Europe

hero.description: Over 100 handmade knitted items with fast delivery throughout Europe

benefits.title: Our Benefits
benefits.description: We strive to make your shopping experience as enjoyable and convenient as possible.
benefits.item1-description: Over 50 high quality hand knitted items
benefits.item2-description: We deliver orders within 24 hours in the city and 1-3 days throughout the country
benefits.item3-description: Our specialists are always in touch and ready to help you with any question.

testimonials.sectionDescription: Real customers' opinions about our store and products

customer1.name: Anna Smirnova
customer1.text: This is the second time I've ordered from this store. I'm very happy with the quality of the products and the service. Fast delivery, everything arrives safe and sound. I'll recommend it to my friends!

customer2.name: Dmitry Petrov
customer2.text: I ordered a scarf, it was delivered the next day. The quality matches the description. Overall, I'm happy with the purchase.

customer3.name: Ekaterina Ivanova
customer3.text: I accidentally found this store on the Internet and did not regret it! The hat + scarf set fit perfectly. Special thanks to the consultant for helping me choose.

customer4.name: Alexey Sokolov
customer4.text: I bought a warm hat, very happy. The material is high-quality, fits perfectly. The price is a little higher than competitors, but the quality is worth it.

customer5.name: Marina Kozlova
customer5.text: A good store with a large selection of knitted products. The scarf is very soft and warm. Overall, I am happy with the purchase and service.

contactPage.title: Ready to help
contactPage.description: Do you have questions or suggestions? We are always in touch and ready to help!

contactInfo.title: Contact Information
